transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir, good morning Aditya sir.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Mai Deepak baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haa boliye.
Customer: Aapke side se video meet ki request aayi thi.
Executive: Nahi nahi meri aisi koi request nahi thi.
Customer: Kisi ne account open kar rakha hai kya IndiaMART ka?
Executive: Nahi nahi kisi ne account open nahi kar rakha hai.
Customer: Actually waha seller panel pe ek video meet ka wo request karne ka option aata hai wahi se aaya tha isliye mai aapko connect kar raha tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi nahi hai. Thank you.
Customer: Thik hai to mai ye video meeting wali concern close kar du na.
Executive: Haa cancel dijiye.
Customer: Thik hai sir, thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive received a video meet request.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed he did not request video meet.
- Customer closed the video meeting concern.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, request, seller panel
